tool.name: tool_4

param.name: INPUT
param.dialogReference:
Input

Grid, input

This must be your input data of type grid.

param.name: MASK
param.dialogReference:
Mask Grid

Grid, input

This grid indicates the cells you want calculate the average.

param.name: RESULT
param.dialogReference:
AWM2 Grid

Grid, output

New grid filtered with the AvWiMa2 tool

param.name: V
param.dialogReference:
Mask value

Floating point

Default: 1.000000

Value of right cells in the Mask Grid

tool.summary: Average With Mask 2 calculates average for cells specified by a mask grid. However cell excluded by the mask grid are used in the average calculation for right pixels.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
